#include<iostream>
#include<algorithm>
#include<cstdio>
#include<string.h>
#include<climits>
#include<vector>
#include<stack>
#include<set>
using namespace std;
#define FOR(i,a,b) for(i=a;i<=b;i++)
#define sint(i) scanf("%d",&i)
#define ss(s) scanf("%s",s)
#define pii pair<int,int>
#define mp(i,j) make_pair(i,j)
#define ll long long
#define MAX 1000000000
#define MOD 1000000007
#define vi vector<pii>
#define vvi vector < vi >
#define pb(i) push_back(i);
#define tr(v,it) for(it=v.begin();it!=v.end();it++)
int main()
{
    int i;
    int t;
    cin>>t;
    int m;
    FOR(m,1,t)
    {
        int n;
        cin>>n;
        int h[n+1];
        int p[n+1];
        FOR(i,1,n)
        {
            cin>>h[i];
        }
        FOR(i,1,n)
        {
            cin>>p[i];
        }
        long long ans=0;
        sort(h+1,h+n+1);
        sort(p+1,p+n+1);
        FOR(i,1,n)
        {
            ans=ans+abs(h[i]-p[i]);
        }
        cout<<"Case "<<m<<": "<<ans<<"\n";
    }
    return 0;
}
